summary: Store app where uploading multiple photos auto-creates one product per photo (default title “ocarina”) with generated descriptions, includes Stripe payments, and provides an admin-only dashboard to add/edit products.
known_issues: Build/request processing failed previously; user may need to retry or simplify request if it happens again.

existing_features.title: Implement admin authorization so that only configured admin principals can perform admin-only actions (e.g., create/update products), and non-admin users are denied.
Create an Admin Dashboard UI that lets an admin view the product list, add a new product, and edit an existing product.
Add navigation/routing so admins can access the Admin Dashboard from the app UI, and non-admin users cannot access admin-only pages.
Establish a coherent visual theme for the admin dashboard and product management UI (colors, typography, spacing, and layout) and apply it consistently across admin screens.

new_feature_requests.summary: Bulk photo upload that auto-creates one store product per photo
Auto-generate product title (default: “ocarina”) and description for each created product
Stripe payment setup for purchasing products
Admin-only dashboard with admin actions (add/edit products)
Add backend product management endpoints to create products and edit existing products (at minimum: title, description, price, and image references), restricted to admins.
